Questionnairehttps://voicecollab.ai/fhir/Questionnaire/VocalFoldParalysis#0.1.0
diagnosis_vfp_gsdDoes the patient have VFP confirmed by laryngoscopy/stroboscopy?0..1choiceValue Set: YesNoNotCertain
diagnosis_vfp_dsWhich side is the paralysis?0..1choiceValue Set: leftRight
diagnosis_vfp_etiologyWhat is the etiology?0..1choiceValue Set: etiology
diagnosis_vfp_iatrogenicIatrogenic (surgery/intubation) subcategory 0..1choiceEnable When: diagnosis_vfp_etiology = 2
Value Set: Iatrogenic
diagnosis_vfp_tumorTumor invading RLN - Subcategory0..1choiceEnable When: diagnosis_vfp_etiology = 3
Value Set: Tumor RLN
diagnosis_vfp_dseDegree of Glottic Gap0..1choiceValue Set: Glottic Gap
diagnosis_vfp_degree_textDegree of dysphonia CAPE-V scale0..1string
diagnosis_vfp_degree_legendLegend: C- Sonsistent I = Intermittent MI = Mildly Deviant MO = Moderately Deviant SE = Severely Deviant0..1string
diagnosis_degree_osOverall Severity 0-1000..1integer
diagnosis_degree_os_2Overall Severity0..1choiceValue Set: Degree
diagnosis_degree_rRoughness 0-1000..1integer
diagnosis_degree_r_2Roughness0..1choiceValue Set: Degree
diagnosis_degree_bBreathiness 0-1000..1integer
diagnosis_degree_b_2Breathiness0..1choiceValue Set: Degree
diagnosis_degree_sStrain 0-1000..1integer
diagnosis_degree_s_2Strain0..1choiceValue Set: Degree
diagnosis_degree_p_naturePitch (Indicate the nature of the abnormality):0..1string
diagnosis_degree_pPitch0..1integer
diagnosis_degree_p_2Pitch0..1choiceValue Set: Degree
diagnosis_degree_l_natureLoudness (Indicate the nature of the abnormality):0..1string
diagnosis_degree_lLoudness 0-1000..1integer
diagnosis_degree_l_2Loudness0..1choiceValue Set: Degree
diagnosis_degree_commentsComments about resonance0..1choiceValue Set: Comments
diagnosis_degree_comments_otherOther (Provide Description) 0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_degree_comments = 2
diagnosis_degree_comments_other_2Additional Features (for example, diplophonia, fry, falsetto, asthenia, aphonia, pitch instability, tremor, wet/gurgly, or other relevant terms): 0..1string
diagnosis_vfp_treatmentHas the patient undergone any treatment for his condition?0..1choiceValue Set: treatment
diagnosis_vfp_treatment_surgerySurgery - Subcategory0..1choiceEnable When: diagnosis_vfp_treatment = 1
Value Set: Surgery Sub Category
diagnosis_vfp_treatment_surgery_thyroplastyThyroplasty - Subcategory 0..1choiceEnable When: diagnosis_vfp_treatment_surgery = 1
Value Set: Thyroplasty
diagnosis_vfp_treatment_surgery_vfiaVocal fold injection augmentation - Subcategory 0..1choiceEnable When: diagnosis_vfp_treatment_surgery = 2
Value Set: Vocal Fold Injection Augmentation
diagnosis_voice_disorders_vocal_fold_paralysis_completeComplete?0..1choiceValue Set: Enrollment Complete ValueSet
